item.title: This One Trick Will Help You Turn Off Your iPhone 11 Even If The Screen Is Broken!
item.description: Introduction Are you an iPhone 11 user who is having trouble turning off your device because the screen is broken? If so, this blog post is for you! Overview of the Issue It can be incredibly frustrating when your iPhone 11 screen is broken and you can’t turn off the device. This can be especially problematic if you’re trying to repair the device or if you’re trying to protect your data.
